text:
$AAPL 

Don’t be upset … 

At least it stayed above 153 .. which is good thing .. it allows us to move up to strike that has been long overdue!

$BABA 11.11 still posted growth. No new fines. No change in guidance. Nothing changed in ecommerce to justify earnings or revenue growth slowing. They’ll post the 32B expected revenue and 6B of earnings. That’s a 33% beat on earnings expectations. 

That’s about 40% growth YoY. Puts their TTM earnings at 24B (including the one time 2.8B fine). 

440B market cap means BABA will be 18 PE after earnings with about 20% avg growth. PEG of .9, $AMZN PEG is over 2. $AAPL PEG is over 3. If $BABA moves to PEG of 1.5 on TTM earnings of 24B that’s a 740B company. If BABA then maintains their 30-40% growth as opposed to expected 10-20%, it’s a 1.5T company.

$SPY $TSLA $AAPL $WISH What up broiz?? Sometimes I see posts on stocktwits that make me worry about the users state of mind!!

So as part of a federal court order, this post serves as my one helpful post I'm legally required to make each month. 

If you are in a bad state of mind, reach out for help, you can always make more money and we all have folks who care about us. 

https://suicidepreventionlifeline.org/  

Bullish on life!!
$AAPL Holding 100, $155 call contracts overnight for an average of $0.25. Let's see. 388k contracts traded today. Making my 100 contracts look like a microscopic trade.

$AAPL has shown that the next leg higher can be under way.  While the momentum is strong right now, we don’t like to chase it, we prefer to buy the pullback against 10/28 low when that takes place.  We don’t like to sell it..  It is  #Elliottwave #Trading #stocks
$AAPL 157 tomorrow, create a big cup from last high, then pullback for the handle. Continuation and ATH in a couple weeks

$AAPL took forever to make profit on my Jun $200 calls. Months holding those scumbag calls. Sold at the top today for 20% profit. Will buy some less risky calls on dips. Still holding a 1/3 of my calls in case we get continuation tomorrow am. Great day.

$AAPL sold too much too quick today. Ended up flat just over $154 missing run to $155. Rebought dips and close. Looked for a quick pull off NVDA earnings but no movement. Should see under $153 early tomorrow.

$GOTU ....China 🇨🇳 is manipulated and suppressed $SPY 👤This chart was posted in 🧑‍🏫 The_Reversal_Room as an example of a bottoming formation that was flagging before this broke out.... I mean beautiful just absolute perfection.... If this was some overextended PE ratio Fanboy stock $AAPL  $TSLA this would have been up over 30% already but instead it hit the first area of any resistance whatsoever and has literally been held down like 🐒 King Kong was sitting on it...$KWEB Sometimes this place just infuriates me and I have to blow off a little steam🤯
$AAPL Open interest on those $155 weeklies will tell the story about this stock. Either it keeps running or it gives back all the gains.

$AAPL

$AAPL Bernstein analyst Toni Sacconaghi notes that while Apple Inc's (NASDAQ:AAPL) EPS has been strong over the last eight years, the company has not benefited from operating leverage. 
The analyst has a Market Perform rating and a price target of $132, implying a 12.6% downside.
Share buybacks and a lower tax rate have been critical drivers of EPS growth, adding 400 to 600 bps and 200 bps per year, respectively.

Not a great day for the market...unless you were long $AAPL and $TSLA like we were today!  Nothing quite like the DrStoxxTrading Room.

To be fair, we took a number of stop-outs today, closing pretty close to even in a weak tape.
$AAPL   🍏  CSCO, just Reported…trading down 6% on “disappointing guidance”.  This may be enough of a drop, to see “Old Guard Tute Managers”, to Exit and Enter/or Add to a “Safe Growth Play”…AAPL.
